metadata.description: AI-Native Orchestrator v2.0 + Hugo Expert Agent. Two skills: SaaS roadmap orchestrator and senior Hugo developer.

plugins.name: indie-studio-roadmap
plugins.description: Two specialized skills: (1) AI-Native Orchestrator with 4-phase loop (Architect → Backend → Frontend → QA) for indie studios building B2B SaaS, and (2) Hugo Expert — senior Hugo developer for static sites with templates, content management, Hugo Pipes, modules, and deployment.
